data.title: Internship at Oxid eSales AG
children: Transitional internship before starting the dual study program.
Module development with the Oxid eShop framework in PHP.

data.titel: Apprenticeship as an Industrial Clerk at TRIGEMA W. Grupp KG
kinder: Practical training at TRIGEMA, with a focus on business knowledge.
Proficiency in Microsoft Dynamics AX, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Microsoft Office suite.
3-week internship as part of the Erasmus+ program in Athens.

data.titel: Various Temporary Positions at Daimler AG
